sentences.english: Her son was sent to the big house for stealing classified papers.
sentences.chinese: 她的兒子因爲盜竊歸好類的文件而被送進了監獄。

sentences.english: In my case, it is the theft report itself.
sentences.chinese: 在本例中，它是盜竊報告本身。

sentences.english: The people asked the government to hit out against corruption and theft.
sentences.chinese: 人民要求政府嚴懲貪污盜竊。

sentences.english: Beijing is pilfering the technology of US and other foreign firms that set up shop on Chinese soil.
sentences.chinese: 北京盜竊在華開展業務的美國和其他外國公司的技術。

sentences.english: Obtain the essential feature that is larcenous behavior secretly.
sentences.chinese: 祕密取得是盜竊行爲的本質特徵。

sentences.english: The thief stood in the dock .
sentences.chinese: 那個盜竊犯站在被告席上。

sentences.english: Xu Tings dishonest act of drawing money from ATM belongs to larceny in the scope of the criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 許霆惡意取款行爲應屬於刑法調整範圍，構成盜竊罪。

sentences.english: Efficiency is priority No. 1, people. Because waste is a thief.
sentences.chinese: 人們效率第一，由於糟躂就是盜竊行爲。

sentences.english: At that time you could hang for stealing .
sentences.chinese: 那時犯盜竊罪就可能會被絞死的。

sentences.english: Some even press criminal charges, which can result in jail time.
sentences.chinese: 一些僱主甚至堅持刑事訴訟，盜竊者將因此被捕入獄。

sentences.english: There're two opinions on the determination of "stealthily substitute" cases' nature: theft and fraud.
sentences.chinese: “調包”的定性有盜竊與詐騙兩種觀點。

sentences.english: Furthermore, possessors are the preferred targets for terrorism and theft.
sentences.chinese: 而且，有核國家是恐怖主義分子和盜竊者偏愛的目標。

sentences.english: The organization is also paying to train local guides on how to stop theft and illegal tree-cutting.
sentences.chinese: 該組織還支付培訓如何制止盜竊和非法伐木當地導遊。

sentences.english: China, of course, reaps short-term gains by committing the biggest theft in history.
sentences.chinese: 當然，中國通過史上最大的盜竊行爲獲取了短期收益。

definition: to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to set on fire/to commit arson
to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
